metadataAttributes.Title: Object-Oriented Design
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course takes Java beginners to the next level by covering object-oriented analysis and design. You will discover how to create modular, flexible, and reusable software, by applying object-oriented design principles and guidelines. And, you will be able to communicate these designs in a visual notation known as Unified Modelling Language (UML).
metadataAttributes.Skills: Object-Oriented Design,Object-Oriented Analysis And Design,Unified Modeling Language (UML),
